cause.description:
A 2006 law outlawed American's the ability to play poker for money online. Not only is the bill hypocritical by allowing other forms of betting online to remain legal while outlawing poker websites, it is a direct blow to American freedom.
1. Poker is a skill, not dumb luck as stated by the proponents of this legislation
2. Congress has no right to intervene in this issue
cause.mission: Allow American citizens to play online poker
cause.name: Bring back Online Poker
